|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = STMicro;STM32F412;onchip; |flash1size = 1 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 256 KiB |ram1chip = STMicro;STM32F412;onchip; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->

|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = Broadcom;BCM43438; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad1txchains = 1 |rad1rxchains = 1 |rad1sstreams = 1 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 150 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 |rad1correv = <!-- core revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |rad1cap = <!-- radio capabilities, Leave blank for none or unknown -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== *[[Cypress]] CYW43438 ([[Broadcom]] BCM43438) *[[STMicro]] STM32F412CGU6 MCU :802.11b/g/n & Bluetooth 4.1 {{FCC ST|02/28/2018|indexme.}}
==Links of Interest== ===Models=== :[https://electricimp.com/platform/hardware/ Platform Hardware] • [https://www.electricimp.com/platform/devices/ Devices] *'''[[electric imp IMP001|imp001]]''' - [[Broadcom]] BCM43362 + MCU *'''[[electric imp IMP002|imp002]]''' - [[STMicro]] STM32F205RG6 MCU :ARM Cortex-M3 @120MHz (128KB RAM, 1MB Flash) *'''[[electric imp imp003|imp003]]''' ([[Murata]] Type 1CD) • [https://developer.electricimp.com/sites/default/files/2017-07/Electric_Imp_imp003_Product_Brief_02May2016.pdf Product Brief] :The smallest imp, with excellent IO, low power modes, :a substantial memory capacity and high speed *'''[[electric imp imp004m|imp004m]]''' ([[Murata]] Type 1MD) • [https://developer.electricimp.com/sites/default/files/2017-07/Electric_Imp_imp004m_Product_Brief_02May2016.pdf Product Brief] :Highly integrated IoT node with 2.4GHz Wi-Fi *'''[[electric imp imp005|imp005]]''' ([[Murata]] Type 1GC) • [https://developer.electricimp.com/sites/default/files/2017-07/Electric_Imp_imp005_Product_Brief_02May2016.pdf Product Brief] :Powerful module with dual-band (2.4/5GHz) Wi-Fi :and 10/100Mbps Ethernet
